messages.message: Seems there is bug in PPTX support, Uploading a trivial powerpoint (see screenshots) leaves the doc viewer with a blank screen.
@Hari should we just exclude pptx support? when i’ve tried it, our ocr output was never a great match for the original slides

@Josh Heidebrecht @Serena This could be a bug. Let's verify this first.

@Rakesh @Abhishek @Atinder Is this conversion accurate? Looks like it's not going through conversion service?

Yes, this also seems to be broader than aihub. As I couldn’t load a pptx in ML studio either. See https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-6082?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiYWZmNTI1MjFlNDY2NGZiNmE1OGRlODIxMmMxNjE5ZDMiLCJwIjoiaiJ9

Yeah ppt/pptx was never added to e2e processing, so it doesn't go through conversion service, and hence no page image(s) are created, no spatial layout preserved, and no support for password protected files.
The documentation for reference: https://dogfood.instabase.com/docs/automate-workflows/step-config-reference/process-files/#supported-file-types-reader-process-files-and-fetch-files
